title-part.text: MIXING, e.g. DISSOLVING, EMULSIFYING OR DISPERSING

note.note-paragraph: This subclass covers:agitation or homogenisation of products formed by a combination of two or more components with the purpose of obtaining a homogeneous composition or homogeneous conditions in the mass of material;stirring of a single material with the purpose of obtaining homogeneous conditions in the mass of material;mixing, agitation and homogenisation of materials, irrespective of the application in which it is produced, whenever the device or the method are directed to achieve the desired effect.
In this subclass, the following term is used with the meaning indicated: "mixing" also covers stirring of a single material.
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.
